TopicTitle: "you just keep trying till you run out of cake and the science get done"

Articles.Content:
Hey!

"you just keep trying till you run out of cake and the science get done"

This is a qoute from the song "still alive" by jonathan coulton thats in the game portal. ( If you haven't played it... play it!)

So as the quote clearly states that if theres science there is cake, and since there is science been done in the game.. there should be cake!

How you would want to inplement it beats me.. a cake... a quote.. an easter egg.. that the kerbals fututre or excisting survival/supply/science bay has cake in it.. an actual cake.. I just want one =)

please let there be cake! Science is at stake!

Anyone else agree? and please don't tell me its a lie! I believe in cake!

Asking for more easter eggs is one of the many items on the [thread=36863]What Not to Suggest List[/thread]. Please peruse it at your leisure.

/thread.
